sourcesContent:
import { memo } from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import './PostDetailForum.scss' import { english, typePostEnglish, typePostVietnamese, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/ListPostForum' function PostDetailForum({ languageSelected }) { const post = useLocation().state.post const languageTypePost = languageSelected === 'EN' ? typePostEnglish : typePostVietnamese return (
{languageTypePost[parseInt(post.topic) - 1].label.toUpperCase()}
{post.title}
{post.description}
{post.comment.map((comment) => (
{comment.name}
{comment.createDate}
{comment.content}
))}
) } export default memo(PostDetailForum)
